# label

**Instance Property**

A string that identifies the rate map.

## Declaration

```swift
var label: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

Object and command labels are useful identifiers at runtime or when profiling and debugging your app using any Metal tool. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Xcode/Naming-resources-and-commands].

## Identifying the rate map

- **device**: The device object that created the rate map.

items.description: The device object that created the rate map.
